mapper.select:
select id from t_star
and ( or headpic like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or name like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or height_num like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or bwh like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or cup like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') or brief_context like CONCAT('%',#{cm.keyword},'%') )

SELECT (SELECT SUM(play_num) FROM t_video tv WHERE tv.star_id = ts.id) AS playNum, ts.id, ts.`name`, ts.`pic_type` AS picType, ts.`headpic`, ts.`brief_context` AS briefContext, ts.`bwh`, ts.`height_num` AS heightNum, (SELECT tk.data_value FROM t_data_key tk WHERE tk.data_key = ts.`cup` AND tk.data_key_type='ZHAOBEI') AS cupName, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_video tv WHERE tv.star_id = ts.id) AS videoNum FROM t_star ts LIMIT 0,4
SELECT ts.id, ts.`name`, ts.`headpic`, ts.`brief_context` AS briefContex, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_video tv WHERE tv.star_id = ts.id) AS videoNum FROM t_star ts where ts.id = #{starId}
